pages.text: This $(l:bewitchment:curses/conducting_curses)Curse$() weakens the body, making the target take twice as much magic damage and makes it harder for them to move.$(br2)Rumor has it that this $(l:bewitchment:curses/conducting_curses)Curse$() is even tied to much worse fates such as $(l:bewitchment:curses/vampirism)Vampirism$() and $(l:bewitchment:curses/lycanthropy)Lycanthropy$().
This is a $(l:bewitchment:curses/conducting_curses)Greater Curse$(); it is slightly harder to get rid of.
